DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether PD 0299685 effective treatment symptom associate interstitial cystitis/painful bladder syndrome , pain , urinary urgency frequency . At time assess drug 's safety tolerability .
DOC.brief_title: An Effectiveness And Safety Study Of PD 0299685 For The Treatment Of Symptoms Associated With Interstitial Cystitis
DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 year age moderate severe interstitial cystitis define pain score . Women must pregnant lactating , They may postmenopausal , surgically sterilize use appropriate method contraception . History interstitial cystitis le 6 month History current recurrent urinary tract infection , genitourinary cancer Any previous urinary diversion procedure without bladder removal , bladder augmentation Use certain drug give bladder 1 month prior study entry
